As we prepare for the upcoming STAAR Assessment, the Spring STAAR Academy to be held at SMITH Elementary will continue as scheduled. We apologize for any inconvenience that this situation has caused. Staff will be available at the time of drop off to answer any questions that you may have on both days.

Respectfully,
Sylvia Ramos
L.C. Smith Elementary Principal

This afternoon, Raymondville High School Administration and Raymondville ISD Police Department investigated a rumor that a gun was brought to campus. After a thorough investigation, police and administration determined the rumor was not true.

If you are aware of any safety concerns or issues, please report them immediately to the Raymondville ISD Police Department at (956) 689-8183. You may choose to remain anonymous.

HSSM's District 16-4A DII Coach of the Year
Names Raymondville HS Cantu...

(Raymondville, Texas)-Winning back-to-back titles in not an easy task in District 16-4A Division II with teams like Port Isabel and Rio Hondo having to compete with annually. The Raymondville Bearkats and head coach Frank Cantu managed to win the outright title since 2017. Prior to 2017, the last time the Bearkats won the district title was in 2010. "We are headed in the right direction and things are going well for us. This is a great honor and this award goes to the entire staff.I thank HSSM for thinking of our Bearkat program." For the past three years, the Bearkast have gone 9-2, 9-2, and now, 8-1 with the playoffs set to begin this weekend.The Bearkats enters the UIL State 4A DII Bi-District playoffs against Corpus Christi West Oso (4-6) this Friday night at home. (HSSMIMages/File)
